subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Roy Halladay gave up a grand slam to Yadier Molina in an abbreviated two-inning start before leaving with shoulder soreness as the Cardinals won, 8-3, at St. Louis.
snippet: Roy Halladay gave up a grand slam to Yadier Molina in an abbreviated two-inning start before leaving with shoulder soreness as the Cardinals won, 8-3, at St. Louis.
